item.description: • Bump version to 1.7.2 • Change force flag shorthand from -f to --f

• Bump version to 1.7.1 • Fix force flag to properly reset the seen commits array • Bump version to 1.7.0 • Add --force and -f options to reset/override all previously processed commits • Bump version to 1.6.0 • [master]: Add --hide and --confidential supports • Add testing documentation to README • Add test:unit script to package.json • Add comprehensive unit tests for text processing functions • Update confidential and hide options to preserve spaces in terms • Add confidential and hide options, improve strip-branch functionality

• [master]: Update README for easy command usage • [master]: Improve README • [master]: Update version • [master]: Add strip branch feature • [master]: Fix all known issues • [master]: Update typo • []: Initial commit
